page.title: 09BUCKMINSTER PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The School has 23 children age 5 - 11, in two classes, Class 1, 5 - 8 (9) chilren, Class 2, 8 - 11 (14). There are 2 teachers plus a part-time secretary, part-time caretaker, and two part-time dinner supervisors. (No school meals - children bring packed lunches since December 1980). The school day is 9.00 - 3.15, 4 weeks per year. Children transfer to John Fernley High School, Melton Mowbray at 11 years. Accommodation: 2 classrooms; one art/craft room; 1 office/staffroom/medical room; 1 disused kitchen (used for teaching); indoor staff and children's cloakrooms, 1 kiln room. Outside: playground; small grassed area. Playing field: use of Buckminster football and cricket field.
